FAQ.Question: Is this course only for memorization?
FAQ.Answer: No. It also teaches understanding, etiquette, and proper usage.

FAQ.Question: Can I start if I don’t know any Du’as?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course introduces Du’as step by step.

FAQ.Question: Is memorization difficult?
FAQ.Answer: No. Du’as are taught gradually with repetition and practical examples.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to use Du’as confidently in daily life?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Step-by-step guidance ensures memorization, understanding, and practical application.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, repeated correction, and clear explanation.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that teaches essential Islamic Du’as, helping students memorize, understand, and use supplications in daily life. Focuses on correct pronunciation, meaning, context, and practical application.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Beginners or those with little knowledge of Du’as
Learners who want to memorize daily supplications
Students aiming to understand meanings and context
Anyone seeking structured guidance in making Du’as confidently

Sections.Heading: Course Structure
Content: Introduction to Du’as and their importance
Daily Du’as (morning, evening, meals, travel, etc.)
Reflection and practical use in daily life

Sections.Heading: What Will You Achieve
Content: Ability to recite essential Du’as correctly
Confidence in using Du’as in daily life
Practice of proper etiquette and supplication habits
